replies.body: **THE ORDER IS GIVEN!**

Customer: "But...that's not what I ordered.."

Azir: "YOU DARE OPPOSE ME?!"
Cazir (pronounced "cash-zeer") has to be a skin now XD
Im thinking more "Manazir" because he was actually the manager, not the cashier
You gotta say the magic words. RIOT. I. WILL. PAY. MONEY. His soldiers could be his employees and for his ult they are holding up pizza boxes as shields! God I want this!
wait his ult should be a counter with a cash register on it. It would be like he is behind working and the enemies are ordering.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I legit logged in to upvote all of this... and as a mastery 7 azir player I WOULD BUY THE SHIT OUT OF THIS!
The ult could even be a wall (like the outside of the restaurant and it has a closed sign on it.)
And his employees should be part time high schools students cause when they get dismissed they come back later (or they get fired)

*Phone Rings*
{{champion:268}} Hello?
{{champion:31}} I'd like a 4-stack pizza.
{{champion:268}} THE ORDER IS GIVEN

{{champion:80}} What's the order??
{{champion:268}} I DON'T KNOW, IT'S JUST GIVEN
{{champion:80}} *sigh* fine.
*makes pizza*
{{champion:80}} SIVER GO DELIVER IT
{{champion:15}} *SCREAMS* FINE
Team of feeders.

{{champion:5}} Here's a tip.
{{champion:268}} Oh, thank yo-
{{champion:5}} AND A SPEAR BEHIND IT!
{{champion:268}} OH GOD
Pretty amazing to think they could put this together considering they're just a small indie game company! So impressive! <3
I sense heavy sarcasm.
I sent heavy _MEME_
Cashzier lmao i dont know why that's so funny to me. make it happen{{champion:268}}
He's the manazir not a cashzir... well maybe he's an assistant manazir who knows. It could be a corporate mundo store after all
Assistant to the Branch Manazir
I want Lulu, Poppy, or Tristana as a Shift Manager.
I want poppy to be holding a giant fake chicken leg the whole time.
New skin where {{champion:78}} wields a chicken leg? Rito please.
I want the chicken leg to be breaded and some of the breading is loose and dangling from the head/blunted end.

azir is the manager 
 
and the pizzeria is called "Panthy's pizza"
OMG RIOT SWIM BANNANAS UR USING POKIMANE'S MERCH!!!!!!!!{{champion:61}}
She signed it for me at PAX. I had to wear it. :D
siiiiiickkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkk {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

I still question why Azir didn't get a food based skin.
If memory serves me correctly, the joke started with Azir in the first place; easily carrying over to Sivir cause they're both from Shurima and her ulty makes people super speedy.

Azir: "Sivir, Kog'Maw has left more Caustic Spittle and Void Ooze in the bathroom. Go clean it. Loyalty will be rewarded."

"Also, he might have left an Icathian Surprise in the toilet." *Hands her a plunger* "Trust in my Vision."
I imagine Galio delivering a bucket like "**HEY EVERYBODY!**"{{champion:3}}
are those two working at Los Pollos Hermanos?
_JESSE! JESSE!_
I demand an **OFFICIAL **Cho'Gath romance novel{{champion:31}} ****
Get Nikasaur back or we riot!

It has absolutely nothing to do with anything that was brought up in the video but I had a friend and for the longest time he pronounced Akali like broccoli, and we tease him all the time about it. 
  So my idea was to make her a skin where she wields two giant pieces of broccoli as weapons. I would totally buy it. Just saying.
I took the photo at 0:38 of thresh! XD Dawn is my friend, so awesome to see her cosplay on here!!
Her hand at 2:10 is still my favorite thing.
Lmao Its MANAZIR (Manager + Azir)
Meh.
When you see it in the 4th picture of the Garen cosplay, you'll shit bricks
Great as always <3
When Azir says: "your emperor is back!" At the time, Rimma was dead..{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Azir reminds me of Gilgamesh from the Fate series.
Not my Summoner Showcase host.
Did anyone see that Dreadknight Garen {{champion:86}} lady was making the circle deal with her fingers to stare at? I looked at it. Here comes 20 losses in row.....
